statements: SELECT * FROM user_identity WHERE id = 1
SELECT username, encrypted_password FROM user_identity WHERE id > 2
SELECT * FROM user_identity WHERE id < 3 ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, public_key FROM user_identity WHERE username = 'alice'
SELECT * FROM user_identity WHERE username LIKE '%john%'
SELECT * FROM user_identity WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, public_key FROM user_identity WHERE id > 3 ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT id, encrypted_password FROM user_identity WHERE id < 5 ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_identity WHERE username = 'john_doe' AND encrypted_password = 'password123' AND public_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, public_key FROM user_identity WHERE username LIKE 'u%' ORDER BY id ASC, public_key DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_identities;
SELECT id, username FROM user_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT encrypted_password FROM user_identities WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM blockchain_authentication ORDER BY authentication_token DESC;
SELECT id, username, public_key FROM user_identities WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM user_identities WHERE id = 1;
SELECT username, public_key FROM user_identities WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT id, authentication_token FROM blockchain_authentication WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT encrypted_password FROM user_identities WHERE id = 3;
SELECT * FROM user_identities WHERE public_key IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, email FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT * FROM user_keys WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT public_key FROM user_keys WHERE private_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT public_key, private_key FROM user_keys WHERE user_id = 2;
SELECT id, auth_token, expiration FROM blockchain_auth ORDER BY expiration DESC;
SELECT id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%' ORDER BY username ASC;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE username LIKE 'A%';
SELECT user_id, email FROM users ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, username, email, password FROM users WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM users ORDER BY username DESC, user_id ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE user_id = 2 OR username = 'admin';
SELECT users.username, user_roles.role_name FROM users JOIN user_roles ON users.user_id = user_roles.user_id WHERE user_roles.role_name = 'admin' ORDER BY users.username ASC;
SELECT user_id, COUNT(token_id) AS token_count FROM user_tokens GROUP BY user_id HAVING COUNT(token_id) > 2 ORDER BY token_count DESC;
SELECT users.username, blockchain_auth.auth_key FROM users LEFT JOIN blockchain_auth ON users.user_id = blockchain_auth.user_id WHERE blockchain_auth.auth_key IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username, password_hash FROM users WHERE username = 'alice';
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM users WHERE username = 'bob';
SELECT user_id, username, blockchain_address FROM users INNER JOIN blockchain_authentication ON users.user_id = blockchain_authentication.user_id;
SELECT * FROM users WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, username FROM users WHERE username = 'john_doe';
SELECT user_id, public_key FROM users WHERE user_id > 5 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT u.username, r.role_name FROM users u JOIN user_roles r ON u.user_id = r.role_id;
SELECT u.username, t.token_value FROM users u JOIN user_tokens t ON u.user_id = t.user_id WHERE t.token_id = 10;
